job_tasks.phrase: Configuring reusable template elements, called AI Controllers in several tools, most notably in ComfyUI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the configuration and use of tools and elements related to AI model operation and control.

job_tasks.phrase: Using various image manipulation tools (both AI and traditional) to create the elements needed for controlling the AI (depth-maps, segmenters and refiners, various models and LoRas)
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the creation of elements (depth-maps, segmenters, refiners, models, LoRas) used for controlling AI, which falls under model adaptation and preparation.

job_tasks.phrase: Support on and managing the training of customized models and LoRas
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the process of training AI models, including custom models and LoRas.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development and integration of AI capabilities into a system that delivers usable outputs to clients, requiring software development practices to ensure control and quality.

soft_skills.phrase: Ensure AI is used in a controlled way to generate high visual quality final usable outputs for our clients

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and management of generative AI tools like ComfyUI and LoRas, along with the creation of AI control elements such as depth-maps and segmenters. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on fine-tuning and deploying generative models.
